name: Robert Yao
major: Materials Science and Engineering and Business Administration
title: TIME II Team Member
bio: I'm a student at UC Berkeley MET, in the MSE+Business track. I have two years' lab research experience at Shanghai Jiaotong University working on advanced materials for photothermal transition and water purification. I am also interested in material synthesis and advanced materials for energy storage and other energy-related fields.Right now I am an affiliate researcher at Prof. Cederâ€™s automation lab at Lawrance Berkeley National Lab.
